Class Users

  • java.lang.Object

    Library

    public class Users
extends LibraryUsers
    Users class of library management system.

      void borrowBook()
      This method asks the user to borrow books from the library.

      This method returns a book which is borrowed by a user.

      This method writes user information to users database.

    • Method Detail

      • borrowBook

        public void borrowBook()
        This method asks the user to borrow books from the library. If book is available, the system borrows books for two months.

      • returnBook

        public void returnBook()
        This method returns a book which is borrowed by a user.

      • writeCSV

        protected void writeCSV()
        This method writes user information to users database.
        Specified by:
        writeCSV in class LibraryUsers

        This method writes users informations (id-name and e-mail)
